shorts.title: Tenor Health says NEPA hospital purchase deal remains under Pa. Department of Health review

shorts.description: Tenor Health Foundation’s CEO said the company is ready to own and operate the Commonwealth Health Systems hospitals in NEPA, but that the transaction still awaits approval from the Pennsylvania Department of Health.

shorts.title: Healthcare workers express relief after announced aquisition
shorts.title_distilled: Healthcare workers express relief after announced aquisition.
shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Healthcare workers in Luzerne and Lackawanna County were relieved Wednesday night after an acquisition was announced involving three local hospitals. The three facilities have faced financial challenges in recent years, and many hope the deal can help turn things around. 28/22 News Reporter Avery Nape spoke with an employee and [...]

shorts.title: PennDOT reminds drivers of Puffer law
shorts.title_distilled: PennDOT reminds drivers of Puffer law.
shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Warming up your car on a cold, snowy January morning might seem harmless, but it could be illegal. 28/22 News cameras found cars idling in Scranton. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation (PennDOT) reminds drivers that it's against the law to leave a running car unattended. While enforcement can vary, many [...]

shorts.title: Scranton Heart Institute pay $46K for alleged submission of false claims

shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) —Officials announced that Scranton Heart Institute has agreed to pay over $48,000 to resolve allegations that it submitted false claims to Medicare.
